traits.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny snake. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Bites
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. 7 (2d6 damage) piercing damage, or 3 (1d6 damage) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer. The target must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw, taking 14 (4d6 damage) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
